title: The Mharisaig Murders
description: The highly-rated author of The Inverannan Assignment and Death at Inverannan returns with his most gripping book yet.THE MHARISAIG MURDERSPreview Quotes:‘Couldn’t put it down - excellent from start to finish’‘Superb! Independent Scottish crime fiction at its best’Be careful who you trust…Adam Darnow returns home to Mharisaig for some much-needed rest and to fix up his derelict cottage. Sounds easy, but someone there has murder on their mind.There’s no shortage of eccentricity in the West Highlands, but one person is taking things to extremes. Is a serial killer after him, or is it just a set of coincidences?As the body count rises, Adam Darnow has Police Scotland on one side, crazy locals on the other and enough relationship problems to drive a man to drink.The whole mystery is made tougher thanks to the criminal past of our hero, who isn’t always in a position to call the cops for help…“Adam Darnow is a fantastic addition to the pantheon of great anti-heroes”“Dark comedy, mystery and crime successfully blended … an outstanding novel”“Tense, intricate and utterly immersive”
author: David Clark Keachie
